name: Git Integration Plugin for JIRA

marketplaceType.toolTip: Evaluate and purchase this add-on through your MyAtlassian account.

version.releaseNotes:
New Features

  • Code Expanders: view context of code 20 lines at a time. http://d.pr/i/10FVG
  • Git Tags: display related git tags. Very helpful in tracking JIRA issues+commits and releases http://d.pr/i/19cr5. Note: this feature is disabled by default for upgrading customers. JIRA administrators can enable this in the Git Integration for JIRA > General settings.

Fixes

  • Fixed: memory leak causing out of memory errors
  • Fixed: long commit messages could cause Commits tab to hang
  • Fixed: Support for commit associations for JIRA keys after project rename

name: Multi Excerpt

marketplaceType.toolTip: Evaluate and purchase this add-on through your MyAtlassian account.

version.releaseNotes:
Updates that seemed to take place with Confluence 5.9 cause it to insert the p tag around rendered macros. We had stripped these out but forgot to strip them out of the cache. This update fixes that issue, but if you still see the problem you might need to flush the cache under Admin -> Cache Management -> net.artemis.plugins.conf.multiexcerpt4.cache

Cheers!

Brendan

name: eazyBI Reports and Charts for JIRA

marketplaceType.toolTip: Evaluate and purchase this add-on through your MyAtlassian account.

version.releaseNotes:
The following main new features are included in this release:

  • New improved UI design – many usability improvements in Analyze and Dashboards tabs and in gadget settings.
  • Publish eazyBI gadgets on Confluence pages using OAuth authentication for the application link.
  • Additional advanced settings for calculated members and custom fields.
  • Add user interface customizations and custom chart types.
  • Database migration tool for migrating all or selected accounts from one eazyBI database to another.

The following main bug fixes are included:

  • Improved cancellation of long report queries after a timeout.
  • Optimized Oracle database metadata queries.
  • Fixed import of user dimensions when users have the same display name as well as when a username is changed.

See the list of all changes.

name: Agile Cards for JIRA

marketplaceType.toolTip: Evaluate and purchase this add-on through your MyAtlassian account.

version.releaseNotes:
Agile Cards for JIRA 3.6.3 bring a number of smaller enhancements and bug fixes. Specifically:

  • We have added a feature to print all cards from Kanban and Scrum boards regardless of the status the issues are in.
  • Agile Cards is using a new JIRA API to print columns on Kanban boards ensuring the compatibility with JIRA 7.1 and newer.
  • We have also fixed several bugs related to product features and improved the add-on’s security.

If you feel like sharing your opinions on using Agile Cards for JIRA please send us an email to support@spartez.com. And if you like our product please do not hesitate to leave a review on Atlassian Marketplace.

Happy Printing and Scanning!

Create stunning visuals to explain your ideas, theme Confluence into a thing of beauty, or take advantage of powerful tools for technical writers. Whether your team is large or small, technical or Luddite, there's a Confluence add-on to get everyone in sync.

summary: This add-on provides a platform to ship small fixes and improvements to make Confluence more compatible with newly released browser versions for customers who cannot immediately upgrade Confluence.

name: Gliffy Diagrams for JIRA

marketplaceType.toolTip: Evaluate and purchase this add-on through your MyAtlassian account.

version.releaseNotes:
Performance improvements and various fixes were the focus of the 4.7.0 release.

The following changes are part of this release:

  • Significant performance improvements when loading, viewing, and editing Gliffy diagrams
  • Storage optimizations
  • Viewer optimizations
  • Bug fixes for:
    • Undo/redo
    • Line styles
    • Pop-up notes
    • Multi-part shape links
    • And more!

compatibleApplications.name: JIRA
compatibleApplications.introduction: Nice one! Your team went JIRA. You've got a best-in-class issue tracker, but that's only the beginning. The Marketplace is brimming with apps for time-tracking, agile project management, test management, and integration with your other systems. Add-ons are ready to help make JIRA the best project tracker you've ever used.

summary:
More Atlassian customers use Gliffy to make information visual and
easier to understand than any other diagramming plugin. The Gliffy JIRA
Plugin allows you to create great-looking, collaborative, web-based
diagrams in a JIRA issue.

summary: A command line interface (CLI) for remotely accessing Confluence. This provides a convenient way to automate Confluence operations. This CLI client that can be used directly with your installation. Part of the Atlassian Command Line Interface family of tools.
